question:
Consider the following statements about the “Amended Technology Upgradation Fund Scheme (ATUFS)”
  1. It is an initiative by the Ministry of Commerce & Industry
  2. It aims at the acquisition of green and energy efficient technologies for the Micro Small and Medium Enterprises
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is incorrect</u>. Amended Technology Upgradation Scheme is an initiative by the Ministry of Textiles. <u>Second statement is incorrect</u>. The scheme has nothing to do with green technologies. In fact, the scheme has provision for providing one-time capital subsidy for eligible benchmarked machinery for textile industry. The capital subsidy provided under the scheme is of 15% for garments and technical textiles segments with a cap of Rs. 30 crore and at the rate of 10% for weaving, processing, jute, silk and handloom segments with a cap of Rs. 20 crore.
